Posts.Content: Can I ask did they tell you it was in your lymph nodes in your armpit as well?
Posts.Title: Stage one breast cancer.

Posts.Content: Hi I have just read all your posts. I get to see my consultant to decide on my treatment on June 7th. When I went for the results of my biopsies they told me cancer had been found in one of the lumps in my breast as well as in one in my lymph nodes.
Posts.Title: Stage one breast cancer.
